bibl.title: Lease of Farmed Taxes or Requisitioning Rights.
Collectanea Papyrologica. Texts Published in Honor of H.C. Youtie. I
bibl.author: Coles, Revel A.

bibl.note: Egypt Exploration Society. Addressed to Aurelius Victor, procurator ad Mercurium. Ca. 199 A.D. Text published here in advance of its eventual inclusion in the Oxyrhynchus series.
Coles Revel A., Lease of Farmed Taxes or Requisitioning Rights.
Collectanea Papyrologica. Texts Published in Honor of H.C. Youtie. I (Bonn, 1976) pp. 281-285.
